example.parse: ( (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (VV 藏有) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 伪造) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (NP (NN 旅行) (NN 证件)))) (CC 或) (VP (ADVP (AD 非法)) (VP (VV 更改) (NP-OBJ (NN 旅行) (NN 证件)))))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* 伪造 (*T*-1)->(旅行证件) 旅行 证件
